replies.msg: 大熱天時，著長衫長褲，揹埋呢樣果樣，真係會熱到暈，明唔明？

There’re many ways to prevent heatstroke during summer. At home sitting in a recliner or an armchair or on a sofa rather than in a chair or on a stool can work wonders for your body. Eating a balanced diet of veggies and fruits and a little meat does wonders for your health. Exercise and meditation do wonders for mind and body. I’m waiting for my friend on the corner outside Times Square. He lives just round the corner so it’ll take him five minutes to come. Meanwhile a pedestrian came and asked if there was any medical centre nearby because he had been suffering from heatstroke. I told him there were a clinic and a pharmacy just around the corner. As summer is around the corner people suffer from heatstroke more easily
